phrases: During our battle with Oracion Seis, Happy and Wendy were captured!
To cure the poisoned, suffering Erza, we need the power of the Sky Dragon Slayer, Wendy!
So that is why we split up and are searchin' for'them!
If it is love and dreams and you it will become magical.
Now, let us cast a smile spell!
I kind of admired this powerful world,
Frozen time has started to move again
I do not need any complicated answers.
Simple feelings are the most important.
You can change those tears she would on sad nights into strength.
Now, let us cast a smile spell!
We will show them just how scary we, Naked Mummy, can be, Zatou-niisan!
Let us get them, real quick like, Gatou-niisan!
We will show them just how scary we, Naked Mummy, can be, Zatou-niisan!
Then we will show them just how...
We sure got an earful of their brain-dead brother banter...
Sounds like they are both the older brother, though.
Get a load of my magic shotgun!
They are not half bad, Zatou-niisan.
Shall we take'them on together, Gatou-niisan?
That guy tried to kill Erza and everyone else!
And he used the Council to fire Etherion!
This man is a ghost, haunted by ghosts...
But you owe him your life.
Now, hurry and resurrect this man.
Whatever you do, do not resurrect that guy!
If you do not resurrect him...
It should be simple for you.
He is going to steal Nirvana!
I heard rumors that he did bad things...
But I do not believe them!
Jellal would never do things like that!
Give me some time to think.
You have got to be kidding me...
Naked Mummy was beaten by just two wizards?
You have got to be kidding me...
Naked Mummy was beaten by just...
They were not small fry at all!
Wow, they actually had some fight in'them.
What in the world were you people thinking?
I are not tellin' you, stupid!
You guys are crazy, you know that.
Guest, the rest is up to you...
I really owe you for what you did to me way back when...
We are not got that kind of relationship, bub!
That is the guy responsible for trying to use Lullaby to assassinate Gramps and the other Masters!
I seem to recall I beat the crap out of him.
I wandered as a free agent through the guilds associated with Oracion Seis...
The day I get revenge on you flies!
The day the Death God is born once again!
Y-You people are going to fight more?
You are more than just crazy!
I lowered the oxygen content in the air around you.
You should no longer be able to stand.
He is got such a cute face!
I will steal your visibility, and freeze your body!
We will show you a thing or two.
What are they trying to do?
Do not let your guard down!
I kind of feel bad now...
I told you not to let your guard down!
While they are distracted by our cute little goblins...
They can even make something like that?
Does it even matter what we do next?
Even though they be fake, I cannot admire those that use living things so thoughtlessly...
Those monkeys were nothing compared to him!
Is not wind the worst match-up for flames?
When it comes to the elements, yes.
The last time they fought it was a pretty tough battle,
but Natsu is not the same as he was back then.
Compared to before, it is on a whole other level!
You have improved quite a lot!
But I got to crush you pretty soon so I can get on with finding Happy and Wendy.
Stop talkin' like that will be so easy, you damn brat!
I will chop you to pieces!
How do you like that destructive power?
I have not been playing around either.
I have been training to build up my magic power to get revenge on you ever since!
You are always so obsessed with little stuff like that, Erigor...
There is got to be some other reason that gets you fired up...
This is not about Eisenwald or Oracion Seis anymore...
As I am a lone wizard, I will defeat you!
Could not you have finished that a bit faster, flame-brain?
So this is the power of Salamander?
This is no time for sleeping!
The abandoned village to the west?
They thought they would beat us, but ended up revealing the location of their base.
I sense a great magic power.
I suppose I will let you off with this for today.
You should feel lucky to be alive, young ones.
Will you shut it, you old fart?
We told you to shut up.
I will be serious this time...
So let us have a fair fight, man to man!
When I am not in front of a woman, I cannot really fight for real...
You know, a skilled hawk should hide its talons and all that...
Why do we have to bring this guy?
You guys should listen to your superiors!
Angel-sama forgot to extract some info.
That copying magic I have heard about?
Let us carry this guy there, quick.
If you will not use it now, when would you?
You think I will let you go?
It looked more like you tripped and fell to me...
I can handle you all by myself.
The poison seems to be spreading more and more...
Hibiki, have they found Wendy yet?
If you use that power recklessly...
Tremendous magical power as always, I see.
I do not know who that guy is...
But is not bringing Wendy back with you more important right now?
You want to save Erza, right?
That did not go as planned.
Well, it is my mistake for releasing him from the restraints.
But he is never been hostile toward me before.
Could he have overheard the discussions about Nirvana, even as he was sleeping?
Does Jellal intend to take Nirvana for himself?!
We will not hand it over to anyone!
Nirvana should be where he is heading!
And I have already heard Jellal's footsteps.
What incredible speed this bastard has.
And all I do is run!
I said you are not getting away!
But you just used too much magic power!
He is not getting past here, not even over my dead body!
I am going to save Erza, you bet!
You stopped my running twice now.
And it will not be the last time, either.
Ice can even stop the time of life itself.
So you will never be able to catch up, for eternity.
You will always be eating the dust of Fairy Tail.
He is totally hogging all the cool parts!
I will not let him get away with it!
That is not the issue here!
Gray was thinking about us when he stayed behind!
I am sick and tired of him acting all cool!
Does he even listen to a word I say?
And what if it is over by the time we get back?
In that case I guess I will just have to fight Gray.
Why do you have to always be that way?
